name: Never Chase The Penguin
description:
Game I try to make for GGJ21. Theme was lost and found. 

You are a penguin with a magical gun who tries to defeat a lion in a arena. During your battle you can lose some of your moves. You must look around the arena to gain new ones. 

Controls: WASD for movement, Mouse1 action#1, Mouse2 action#2, Space action#3

Actions: "gun" -  "jump"  - "dash"  - "shield" ":(" if you do not have action in that button, cause its sad.    

Hope you enjoy. 

Design and Developed by: Ege Guldali
Models: Animal Assets --> Taken from VoxelGuy, Environment Assets --> Taken from POLYPERFECT

Sound Effects: All sound effects have taken from https://freesound.org/

Background Music: "Action Rhytms" by David by Fesliyan  https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/download/action-rhythms/431
